## SavedObjectsSerializer.rawToSavedObject() method

Converts a document from the format that is stored in opensearch to the saved object client format.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rawToSavedObject(doc: SavedObjectsRawDoc): SavedObjectSanitizedDoc;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doc | [SavedObjectsRawDoc](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsrawdoc.md) | The raw OpenSearch document to be converted to saved object format. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[SavedObjectSanitizedDoc](./opensearch-dashboards.savedobjectsanitizeddoc.md)
